summary: REQ-36 is partially implemented: a new GoldSilverRatesCard is added and wired into DashboardPage with dropdowns and dummy price calculations, but the city dropdown does not appear to use “Indian capital cities” as required. REQ-37 is implemented for header/footer logo paths, but there is evidence other User Portal pages may still reference a different logo asset, so “consistent across the User Portal UI” is not fully met.

missing_requirements.requirement: City dropdown should list Indian capital cities.
missing_requirements.reason: The added city list includes non-capital cities (e.g., Mumbai, Bangalore, Kolkata, Chennai, Hyderabad, Ahmedabad, Pune, Jaipur, Lucknow) rather than Indian capital cities.

missing_requirements.requirement: Use the correct ArthaNidhi Pay logo artwork consistently across the User Portal UI (at minimum header and footer), replacing incorrect logo asset paths where needed.
missing_requirements.reason: Header and Footer were updated to use /assets/generated/arthanidhi-logo.dim_512x512.png, but the diff summary indicates LoginPage still uses a different logo asset ("logo-1.png"), suggesting logo usage is not consistent across the User Portal UI.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed footer content to include caffeine.ai attribution, a heart icon, a demo disclaimer, and a hardcoded © 2026 line.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to fix the logo; it did not request changing footer attribution/disclaimer/copyright text.
